custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT calendarBookingId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CalendarBooking WHERE (companyId = ?) [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(location) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND ( (startTime >= ? AND endTime <= ?) OR (startTime <= ? AND endTime >= ?) OR (startTime >= ? AND startTime <= ? AND endTime >= ?) OR (startTime <= ? AND endTime >= ? AND endTime <= ?) ) [$STATUS$]
SELECT {CalendarBooking.*} FROM CalendarBooking WHERE ( (recurrence IS NOT NULL) OR (startTime >= ?) ) AND (firstReminder > 0) AND (status = 0)

SELECT {CalendarBooking.*} FROM CalendarBooking WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] [$CALENDAR_ID$] [$CALENDAR_RESOURCE_ID$] (parentCalendarBookingId = ?) AND ( (lower(title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(location) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND ( ( (startTime >= ? AND endTime <= ?) OR (startTime <= ? AND endTime >= ?) OR (startTime >= ? AND startTime <= ? AND endTime >= ?) OR (startTime <= ? AND endTime >= ? AND endTime <= ?) ) [$RECURRENCE$] ) [$STATUS$] [$ORDER_BY$]

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT calendarId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Calendar WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] [$CALENDAR_RESOURCE_ID$] ( (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {Calendar.*} FROM Calendar WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] [$CALENDAR_RESOURCE_ID$] ( (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) [$ORDER_BY$]

[$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (active_ = ?)
